long_description: A versatile all-mountain companion, the lightweight Arc'teryx Kea 37 Pack features a multitude of convenient and comfortable features for gear-intensive day trips or light and fast weekend adventures. Dual-density shoulder straps, thermoformed hipbelt and modular sternum strap work together to create a comfortable and supportive harness. Twin removable aluminum stays provide load support and effectively transfer load weight to your hips. Hydration bladder clip, tube port and modular hose clip accommodate a reservoir of your choice (sold separately). Top-loading main compartment features an extendable collar with drawcord for additional capacity. Fixed top lid contains 2 zippered compartments and a key clip; stash gear in the roomy front kangaroo pocket with stealth pocket or the 2 stretch side pockets. Enhance load balance and take up extra volume with the 4 compression straps-2 on each side. The Arc'teryx Kea 37 Pack features a P'ax ice-tool attachment that allows easy, one-handed access to tools.
short_description: A versatile all-mountain companion, the lightweight Arc'teryx Kea 37 Pack features a multitude of convenient and comfortable features for gear-intensive day trips or light and fast weekend adventures.
